main event: On the evening of 15 May 1953, military personnel at Ellington Air Force Base, Texas, observed an unusual and brilliant object moving across the sky.
interesting points: The object was first sighted at about 20 to 25 degrees from the horizon.,The object traveled in a north-northeast direction at a uniform speed.,It appeared to be about twice the size of a star or planet and pulsated instead of emitting steady light.,The sighting lasted approximately 45 seconds before the object faded from view.,An investigation was immediately initiated after the airman reported the observation.
sighted object: unidentified brilliant object in the sky
